name: Crescent Bloom
description:
You are Ignis, a young pyromancer living in the countryside of the Constantin Empire, a fantasy counterpart of the Roman Empire. Your little brother Felix is kidnapped by the Trians, a species of lizard-plant people, who up until recently showed no signs of aggression. With the help of the legionnaires, your goal is to travel across the land known as Solanum, in search of your missing brother.

Explore the secrets of the world of Crescent Bloom and discover the truth behind the Trian's sudden attacks and kidnappings of human citizens. Learn about your fellow legionnaire's personal stories and the lore behind various landmarks, such as the God Tree, Altair Majoris, which seems to be at the center of the intrigue...

The game includes...

  • A story-rich environment,
  • Several non-linear 2D platformer-type levels,
  • A variety of puzzles involving colors and sound,
  • Secret areas with unique collectibles,
  • An intuitive combat system,
  • A challenging boss fight!

Do you have what it takes to battle the Trians?
